block.p: $790,000 440 West 23rd Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,300-sq.-ft. prewar co-op in a town house; high ceilings, hardwood floors, 2 fireplaces, terrace facing gardens; maintenance $714, 55% tax-deductible; listed at $800,000, 2 weeks on market (brokers: Manhattan Apartments; Stribling Wells & Gay)

$1.95 million 451 Broome Street 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 2,500-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar loft building; keyed elevator, 11-ft. ceilings, arched windows, 3 exposures; maintenance $635, 40% tax-deductible; listed at $1.95 million, 8 weeks on market (broker: Bascom & Sears)

$1 million 366 Broadway (Franklin St.) (Collect Pond House) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 2,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 13-ft. ceilings, marble baths, hardwood floors, washer/dryer and dishwasher in unit, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,337, 65% tax-deductible; listed at $975,000 (multiple bids), 5 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

$790,000 440 West 23rd Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,300-sq.-ft. prewar co-op in a town house; high ceilings, hardwood floors, 2 fireplaces, terrace facing gardens; maintenance $714, 55% tax-deductible; listed at $800,000, 2 weeks on market (brokers: Manhattan Apartments; Stribling Wells & Gay)

$1.95 million 451 Broome Street 3-bedroom, 1-bath, 2,500-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar loft building; keyed elevator, 11-ft. ceilings, arched windows, 3 exposures; maintenance $635, 40% tax-deductible; listed at $1.95 million, 8 weeks on market (broker: Bascom & Sears)

$1 million 366 Broadway (Franklin St.) (Collect Pond House) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 2,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; 13-ft. ceilings, marble baths, hardwood floors, washer/dryer and dishwasher in unit, 2 exposures; maintenance $1,337, 65% tax-deductible; listed at $975,000 (multiple bids), 5 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

$560,000 340 East 64th Street (St. Tropez) 1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,300-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, new windows, hardwood floors, pool in building; common charge $455, taxes $3,732; listed at $595,000, 6 weeks on market (Broker: Douglas Elliman)

$535,000 421 Hudson Street (Printing House) 1-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 900-sq.-ft. duplex condo in a prewar loft building; concierge, high ceilings, health club and pool in building; common charge $220, taxes $3,000; listed at $550,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Halstead Property Co.)

$485,000 703 East 27th Street 7-bedroom, 2 1/2-bath, 105-year-old detached house; sunroom, 2 fireplaces, original moldings and detail, 50-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $1,780; listed at $500,000, 1 week on market (broker: Mary Kay Gallagher)

$418,000 441 Third Street 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,700-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar limestone building; dining room, renovated kitchen and bath, original moldings and detail; maintenance $550, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $439,000, 2 weeks on market (broker: Brooklyn Properties of 7th Avenue)

$510,000 533 17th Street 4-bedroom, 1-bath, 3-story, semi-attached circa 1900 town house; dining room, hardwood floors, 40-by-115-ft. lot; taxes $1,614; listed at $539,000, 3 weeks on market (broker: Elaine Gay Real Estate)

$1.545 million 167 Greenway North 6-bedroom, 4 1/2-bath, 70-year-old Mediterranean style; dining room, eat-in kitchen, library, den, 3 fireplaces, finished basement, 2-car garage, 145-by-135-ft. irregular lot; taxes $8,400; listed at $1.69 million, 8 weeks on market (brokers: Sara Jones Real Estate; Terrace Realty)

$455,000 15 Duncan Hill Road 3-bedroom, 2-bath, 30-year-old contemporary; entry foyer, fireplaces, dressing area off master bedroom, 60-by-178-ft. lot; taxes $2,082; listed at $499,000, 15 weeks on market (broker: Kingsley Real Estate)

$625,000 40 Fernwood Road 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 18-year-old contemporary; beamed and cathedral ceilings, rear deck, sunroom, master bathroom with whirlpool bath, 3-car garage, 90-acre lot with barn and riding area; taxes $11,535; listed at $719,000, 10 weeks on market (broker: Weichert Realtors)

$755,000 73 Weaver Street (Pheasant Run) 3-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 3,371-sq.-ft. town house condo in an 11-year-old building; dining room, family room, whirlpool bath in master bathroom, 2 flagstone terraces, fireplace; common charge $375, taxes $6,290; listed at $795,000, 22 weeks on market (brokers: Preferred Properties; Coldwell Banker/Greenwich)
